fieldsOfStudy: Mathematics, Physics, Biology, Psychology, Chemistry, Biomedical Ethics, Engineering, History

headline: Award winning Management Professional delivering high performance the smart way
summary:
Winner of multiple DHS Awards, Agile Leader guiding, nurturing, and growing highly performing groups for multiple clients and continuously delivering projects with excellent client satisfaction.

Expertise include: Peoject Management (Agile, PMI), Requirements Engineering, Systems Architecture, Process Improvement and IT Consulting.

positions.description:
Researched resilience of Command and Control Architecture
Advisor: Dr. Zaid Abbasi, Ph.D.
Systems Architecture Lab, George Mason University, Fairfax, VA
positions.title: Researcher

positions.description: Collaboratively designed an intelligent decision support system (IDSS) to configure and assemble clustered space satellites for DARPA Systems F6 project. As part of the project I designed and routinely updated the systems architecture. Also programmed part of the IDSS.
positions.title: Systems Architect

positions.description:
- Lead efforts of business process improvement and automation.
- Implemented SharePoint Services for the company.
positions.title: Systems Engineer

positions.companyName: University of Virginia; Dept. of Biomedical Engineering
positions.description:
Collaboratively designed a rehabilitation device called Hip Continuous Passive Motion (CPM) Technology. Acquired patent on technology and in talks with potential buyers.

Advisor: Dr. Laura Lee, MD (University of Virginia)
Co-inventor: Mr. Kenneth Garrett (B.S. BME UVA), Dr. Laura Lee, MD
positions.title: Inventor/Biomedical Engineer

positions.description:
Conducted flux variability analysis of a preexisting computational model (metabolic network) of C. reinhardtii (microorganism) using COBRA linear optimizing toolbox in Matlab, in order to investigate the validity of the computational model.

Key skills: biostatistics, computational modeling, optimization, systems analysis, and scientific literature research

Advisor: Dr. Jason Papin, Ph.D.; Dr. Ani Manichaikul Ph. D.
positions.title: Student Researcher: Metabolic Network Analysis of a Biofuel Producing Organism

positions.description:
Summary: Investigated ultrasound imaging techniques of cancerous tumors in the prostate gland using contrast agents and imaging phantoms

Advisor: Dr. Timothy Allen, Ph.D. & Dr. Abhay Patil Ph.D.
positions.title: Investigator of Ultrasound Imaging Technology
